text: Shaoxing () is a city and a municipality in China. It is in the Zhejiang province. 4,347,200 people live there. The area of Shaoxing Municipality is 8,256 square kilometres. Lu Xun () born in Shaoxing is a famous writer in China. == Political divisions == Shaoxing Municipality is divided into 1 district, 3 cities and 2 counties. *Yuecheng District () *Shangyu City () *Shengzhou City () *Zhuji City () *Shaoxing County () *Xinchang County () == Sister cities == * Sandakan, Malaysia Category:Cities in China Category:Zhejiang
title: Shaoxing
